files.content:
data "aws_caller_identity" "current" {}

data "aws_availability_zones" "available" {
  state = "available"
}

locals {
  name_prefix = "${var.project_name}-${var.environment}"

  azs = slice(data.aws_availability_zones.available.names, 0, var.az_count)

  # If a domain is provided, we create ACM + HTTPS listener and Route53 record.
  use_custom_domain = length(trimspace(var.domain_name)) > 0

  ecr_image = "${aws_ecr_repository.app.repository_url}:${var.image_tag}"

  # The app code expects a file named client_secret.json.
  # We write the secret to /tmp/client_secret.json at container start.
  client_secret_path = "/tmp/client_secret.json"

  # EFS mount path for SQLite DB
  efs_mount_path = "/data"
  sqlite_db_path = "${local.efs_mount_path}/pynecone.db"
}

terraform.tfvars.example
files.content:
aws_region   = "us-east-1"
project_name = "pynecone-mail-sorter"
environment  = "dev"

# Optional: set to enable HTTPS + Route53 record
# domain_name    = "app.example.com"
# hosted_zone_id = "Z1234567890ABCDEFG"

# REQUIRED: paste the full JSON contents of your Google OAuth client_secret.json
google_oauth_client_secret_json = <<EOT
{
  "installed": {
    "client_id": "REPLACE_ME",
    "project_id": "REPLACE_ME",
    "auth_uri": "https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/auth",
    "token_uri": "https://oauth2.googleapis.com/token",
    "auth_provider_x509_cert_url": "https://www.googleapis.com/oauth2/v1/certs",
    "client_secret": "REPLACE_ME",
    "redirect_uris": [
      "https://app.example.com/callback"
    ]
  }
}
EOT

# After pushing an image to ECR, set the tag here
image_tag = "latest"
